name: International Congress on AI and Machine Learning
content: On behalf of International Congress on AI and Machine Learning, we are delighted to welcome you to join the Congress scheduled on August 02-03, 2021 Zurich, Switzerland which is an exceptional gathering for the worldwide prominent scholastics in the field of IT Industries where Directors, Professors, Research scholars, Postdocs, Academic Staff are about to share their research work and acquiesce new emerging technological trends in the conference areas. Artificial Intelligence 2021 is an International platform to adverse and study about the latest technology, innovations, applications, and intense research to Share complete Knowledge. The conference contains significant international experts, professor, specialists, research scholars and Student Delegates and Exhibitors form all over the world to our congress with the theme “Deploying the knowledge on AI and robotics on the edge’’. Conference will be featuring oral presentations, poster presentations, keynote talks, workshops and many more.
